column4: Hi, everyone. I just got my first Linux server (Ubuntu Hardy) set up and running and on IRC!
Basically, I want to learn Linux and I don't have spare hardware. This achieves it
Can anyone point me to a resource that would help a noob understand how to get to a graphical desktop on Ubuntu over ssh? I would prefer not to use vnc if possible
you can also tunnel vnc over ssh, so that the only port you're using is the SSH port
